item.title: Question: Trade - (Talk to);
item.dc:creator: @mrX mrX
item.description:
@mrX wrote:

[center][i]I need help.

I’m adding an npc, that’s already got the option trade.
I’ve added the npc correctly as a shop.[/i]

else if (NPCID == 540) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; }

[i]When I right click the npc and select ‘Trade’ it doesn’t do anything.
When I right click the npc and select ‘Talk to’ it bring up the shop interface.

I need to make it so you have to select ‘Trade’.

Please help.[/i][/center]

Read full topic
